scripts.test: NODE_ENV=test istanbul cover --report teamcity --report lcov _mocha -- --ui bdd --check-leaks --recursive --slow 200 --reporter spec --globals 'Intl,IntlPolyfill' server/test
scripts.quality: npm run buddyjs && npm run inspectjs && npm run lint
scripts.test-acceptance: NODE_ENV=test istanbul cover --report teamcity --report lcov _mocha -- --ui bdd --check-leaks --recursive --slow 200 --reporter spec --globals 'Intl,IntlPolyfill' $(find server/test/**/acceptance server/test/acceptance -name '*.js' 2>/dev/null)
scripts.test-changed: NODE_ENV=test mocha --ui bdd --check-leaks --recursive --slow 200 --reporter spec --globals 'Intl,IntlPolyfill' $(git diff --name-only test | grep -E '(\.js)$')
scripts.test-component: NODE_ENV=test istanbul cover --report teamcity --report lcov _mocha -- --ui bdd --check-leaks --recursive --slow 200 --reporter spec --globals 'Intl,IntlPolyfill' $(find server/test/**/component server/test/component -name *.js 2>/dev/null)
scripts.test-unit: NODE_ENV=test istanbul cover --report teamcity --report lcov _mocha -- --ui bdd --check-leaks --recursive --slow 200 --reporter spec --globals 'Intl,IntlPolyfill' $(find server/test/**/unit server/test/unit -name '*.js' 2>/dev/null)
